original_title: Bob Mizer: Hardcore Loops 1968-1973 — Americana Collection 10
overview: AMG's Bob Mizer claimed he never produced hardcore, but now his secret is EXPOSED!  His collection of raw sex film loops has been discovered in AMG's private film vault amongst thousands of films. AMG has digitally remastered this footage to its full pulsing glory.  This collection of uninhibited Hardcore Film Classics is from the dawn of gay porn. Includes the shorts: "Vito And The Love Bandit," "Pass The Soap," "Ky & The Nazi," "Jailhouse Fun," "Sailor & The Singing Cowboy," "Sailors & The Hippie," "Boy's Games," "Prisoner's Promise," and "Shore Leave," as well as "Cum!," a collection of cumshots.
tagline: Raw hardcore from the AMG vault
title: Bob Mizer: Hardcore Loops 1968-1973 — Americana Collection 10
